passions.name: Italy
passions.description: Italy is where I born and where I spent my childhood. I used to live in San Vittore Olona, a little town close to Milan.

passions.name: Malta
passions.description: In 2014 I moved in Malta because of working and I had been living here for almost 2 years. What can I say about this island? It's sunny, hot but also very small.

passions.name: London
passions.description: In November 2015 I moved in London. I always dreamed to have a job in UK and I am so happy that I have accomplished my dream!

passions.name: Japan
passions.description: Japan is one of the place that I like most. I spent two weeks here in May 2017 and being here was a dream. I really love the japanese culture, the food and the environment.

passions.name: UX
passions.description: I have been intersted to technology and communication since I was a little girl and this passion is the reason because I chose my career path and the field of studies. Now I am working as UX and Software Engineer in Zebra Technologies.

passions.name: Design
passions.description: I have a Design background because I studied Communication Design in the University. My priority is to develop Software and apps thinking about the best experience for the user.

passions.name: Games
passions.description: I love Games, no matters if are video games or board games. During my time in University I also designed my own board game with a group of friends.

passions.name: Travelling
passions.description: I love travelling, especially walking around a place. I believe that travelling is the best way to learn something new.

passions.name: Food
passions.description: As italian I love food, especially fresh fish and tropical fruit. But I hate artichokes... no matters how they have been cooked.

passions.name: Gym
passions.description: Because I love good food I try to stay in fit going to the gym. My favourite training is BoxFit!

passions.name: Movies
passions.description: Watching movies is the best way to relax myself. My favourite movie is 'the one that I have not seen yet'

passions.name: Cartoons
passions.description: I grew up watching Walt Disney's cartoons and I feel them as part of me. Now I love watching Anime (japanese cartoons) and I am a big fan of the Studio Ghibli.

passions.name: Music
passions.description: I like different kind of music but I have a true devotion for Rock. My favourite bands (for now) are 'The Muse' and 'The Imagine Dragons'.

passions.name: Drawing
passions.description: One of my hobbies is drawing and since I love graphics vectors my favourite tool is Illustrator.

passions.name: Photography
passions.description: I love photography! Sometimes you can find me in the early morning taking some shots!
